reviewText: If you want to see a wonderful concert on location and if you want to be in a park setting this one is for you. Pavarotti does a wonderful job as well as gives a wonderful concert in this video and all the music was I thought very well selected so everybody else involved as well as the group that performed with him they all including Pavarotti did a wonderful job with this concert on location. So this indeed was great music along with a great vocalist.
